DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Training Enhanced Supported Employment Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Schizophrenia chronic , severe , disable brain disorder affect 2.4 million people United States . Individuals schizophrenia may difficulties cognitive functioning , include problem attention , memory , organizational thought process . These factor lead decrease productivity poor work performance , may make hold job difficult . Research show certain type psychological therapy , cognitive behavioral therapy , useful reduce severity schizophrenic symptom . The purpose study determine whether computer-based cognitive enhancement training program , combination work therapy program , enhance workplace performance , productivity , quality life individual schizophrenia . This study enroll individual schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder . Participants undergo cognitive assessment baseline . They randomly assign either 12-month cognitive enhancement training program plus 12-month work therapy program 12-month work therapy program alone . Participants cognitive enhancement train program receive feedback cognitive strength weakness base outcomes baseline assessment . The training component comprise 150 computer-based exercise focus improve memory , attention , organizational skill . Participants attend two weekly meeting : one focus provide feedback regard goal-setting problem-solving , focus improve verbal skill social information processing . Individuals take part work therapy program attend two non-cognitive discussion group per week . All participant work 20 hour week approve work environment , access appropriate support service . Following end program , participant option work additional 12 month . Schizophrenia symptom , quality life , neuropsychological rehabilitation effect assess end Years 1 2 .
